title: Letting The Demons Out
description: Ancient gods, flesh-eating immortals, sentient machines, a gun wielding monster, and a man with a unique and terrible addiction... They all reside within the pages of LETTING THE DEMONS OUT, the debut collection from Ray Wallace, author of ESCAPE FROM ZOMBIE CITY: A ONE WAY OUT NOVEL and THE HELL SEASON.Face your fears. Enjoy the nightmares. The demons are waiting...
author: Ray Wallace
